dialogueTree.title: Perception (Smell): "The smell... It's awful and familia..."
dialogueTree.english: The smell... It's awful and familiar.
dialogueTree.polish: Ten smród. Jest paskudny, ale i znajomy.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Гэты смурод. Ён агідны, але і знаёмы.

links.title: You: "Hold on, that *is* awful. (Cover yo..."
links.english: Hold on, that *is* awful. (Cover your nose.)
links.polish: Chwila, to *naprawdę* paskudne. (Zatkaj nos).

links.title: Perception (Smell): "It doesn't help. You can still smel..."
links.english: It doesn't help. You can still smell it.
links.polish: To nic nie daje. Nadal czujesz ten zapach.
links.belarusian: Гэта нічога не дае. Ты ўсё роўна адчуваеш гэты пах.

links.title: Endurance: "Keep it in now. Don't overreact. Br..."
links.english: Keep it in now. Don't overreact. Breathe.
links.polish: Tylko nie zwracaj. Nie reaguj przesadnie. Oddychaj.
links.belarusian: Толькі не вяртай. Не рэагуй празмерна. Дыхай.

links.title: You: "What is it?"
links.english: What is it?
links.polish: Co to?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "You've never smelled anything this..."
links.english: You've never smelled anything this bad before. It's pungent, but with a faintly cloying sweetness like cheap perfume on Death itself.
links.polish: Nigdy nie czułeś tak potwornego smrodu. Jest ostry, ale przy tym mdląco słodki, jakby śmierć postanowiła się poperfumować.
links.belarusian: Ніколі не адчуваў такога жудаснага смуроду. Ён востры, але пры гэтым ванітава-салодкі, нібыта смерць вырашыла надушыцца парфумамі.

links.title: Half Light: "Something cold wakes in the pit of..."
links.english: Something cold wakes in the pit of your stomach: fear.
links.polish: W żołądku budzi ci się do życia coś zimnego. To strach.
links.belarusian: У жываце ажывае нешта халоднае. Гэта страх.

links.title: Logic: "It *is* death. It must be."
links.english: It *is* death. It must be.
links.polish: To *śmierć*. Z całą pewnością.

links.title: You: ""Kim, what's that smell?""
links.english: "Kim, what's that smell?"
links.polish: „Kim, co to za zapach?”

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant has already brought..."
links.english: The lieutenant has already brought a handkerchief to his nose.
links.polish: Porucznik zdążył już przytknąć chusteczkę do nosa.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант ужо паспеў прыкласці насоўку да носа.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Eyes up, detective. Something's no..."
links.english: "Eyes up, detective. Something's not right here."
links.polish: „Uwaga, detektywie. Coś tu jest nie tak”.

links.title: You: ""Heads up, lieutenant. Something's..."
links.english: "Heads up, lieutenant. Something's not right here."
links.polish: „Uwaga, poruczniku. Coś tu jest nie tak”.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant has already brought..."
links.english: The lieutenant has already brought a handkerchief to his nose.
links.polish: Porucznik zdążył już przytknąć chusteczkę do nosa.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант ужо паспеў прыкласці насоўку да носа.

links.title: You: "Goddamnit..."
links.english: Goddamnit...
links.polish: Jasna cholera...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "A sense of dread washes over you as..."
links.english: A sense of dread washes over you as you look ahead.
links.polish: Kiedy spoglądasz przed siebie, ogarnia cię lęk.

links.title: You: "It's a dead corpse isn't it?"
links.english: It's a dead corpse isn't it?
links.polish: To jakiś trup, prawda?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Yes. A sense of dread washes over y..."
links.english: Yes. A sense of dread washes over you as you look ahead.
links.polish: Tak. Kiedy spoglądasz przed siebie, ogarnia cię lęk.
links.belarusian: Так. Калі глядзіш наперад, ахоплівае цябе страх.

links.title: You: "I don't want to be here."
links.english: I don't want to be here.
links.polish: Nie chcę tutaj być.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The signs of decaying meat. It anno..."
links.english: The signs of decaying meat. It announces itself from two dozen metres away. A warning, a *memento mori*.
links.polish: Smród gnijącego mięsa. Wyczuwalny już z dwudziestu metrów. Ostrzeżenie. *Memento mori*.
links.belarusian: Смурод гніючага мяса. Адчувальны ўжо з дваццаці метраў. Папярэджанне. *Memento mori*.

links.title: You: "Isn't it just the rotting fish?"
links.english: Isn't it just the rotting fish?
links.polish: A to nie po prostu gnijące ryby?
links.belarusian: Ці гэта не проста гнілыя рыбы?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Don't be naive."
links.english: Don't be naive.
links.polish: Nie bądź naiwny.

links.title: You: "Oh no..."
links.english: Oh no...
links.polish: O nie...

links.title: You: "What is it then?"
links.english: What is it then?
links.polish: W takim razie co to?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "No, it's much worse than that."
links.english: No, it's much worse than that.
links.polish: Nie, to coś o wiele gorszego.
